label: G4 NCC FM: Car Counter Sensor FM
description: The Nwave Car Counter FM Sensor is an advanced vehicle counting solution designed to provide real-time data on the number of cars entering and exiting a specific area. Utilizing LoRaWAN technology, this sensor enables accurate vehicle flow monitoring, ideal for applications in parking facilities, traffic management, and smart city projects. Flush-mount, in-ground, sensor modification for heavy snowplow regions
